lead_paragraph: ADESMAN--Jerome, on June 2, 2016. Beloved husband of the late Alice. Loving father of Drs. Peter, Andrew and Michael and their spouses Drs. Robin Miller, Angela Romano and Susan Weil. Cherished grandfather of seven. Proud and respected physician for over 50 years. Services Sunday, 11:30am at "The Riverside," 76th Street and Amsterdam Avenue. 1/3
